nodes.text: The Veermok Cave was a cave nestled within the Gallo Mountains near Dee'ja Peak on Naboo. During the last decades of the Old Republic, the cave was an ore mine operated by the Jandosan Mines. However, all mining activities were stopped when a pack of giant veermoks overtook the cave. By the time of the Battle of Yavin, the veermoks still lived in the abandoned mine. The Mon Calamari scientist Ronin Lightrunner who studied the veermoks once gave a spacer the coordinates to the cave.
The Veermok Cave was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
